trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Contiene un insieme di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewButtonColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that respond to simple user input.
trans-unit.target: La classe DataGridViewButtonColumn è un tipo specializzato del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>classe utilizzata per ospitare in modo logico le celle che rispondono all'input dell'utente semplice.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewButtonColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: Un DataGridViewButtonColumn ha un associato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>in ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>che interseca tale</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: Ogni cella fornisce un'interfaccia utente (UI) che è simile a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: To display the same button text for every cell, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> property to the desired button text.
trans-unit.target: Per visualizzare il testo del pulsante stesso per ogni cella, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>proprietà `true` e impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>proprietà per il testo del pulsante desiderato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: La modalità di ordinamento predefinito per questo tipo di colonna è <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: To respond to user button clicks, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Per rispondere ai clic dell'utente, gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the event handler, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether the click occurred in the button column.
trans-unit.target: Nel gestore eventi, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per determinare se si è verificato il clic nella colonna di pulsanti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether the click occurred in a button cell and not on the column header.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per determinare se si è verificato il clic in una cella di pulsanti e non nell'intestazione della colonna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>, and cell styles specified through properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> have no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando sono abilitati, i pulsanti in una colonna vengono disegnati utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>gli stili specificati, ad esempio tramite le proprietà della cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>non hanno alcun effetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"> </xref> classe allo stato predefinito.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore inizializza la colonna impostando le proprietà seguenti.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>.| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>|
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Valore | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>| Un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>. | | La proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>dell'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>restituita dalla proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il modello utilizzato per creare nuove celle.

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>classe inizializza questa proprietà su un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> appena creato</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > La modifica le proprietà del modello di cella non immediatamente avrà l'interfaccia utente (UI) delle celle della colonna esistente.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: Queste modifiche saranno visibili solo dopo la rigenerazione della colonna (ad esempio, dell'ordinamento della colonna o tramite una chiamata al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>(metodo)).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> al quale sono modellate tutte le altre celle nella colonna.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property could not be cast to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore specificato durante l'impostazione di questa proprietà non può essere convertito in un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia esatta di questa colonna.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of button cells.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per duplicare una colonna di celle a pulsante.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta il duplicato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile di cella predefinito della colonna.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has an initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>restituita da questa proprietà ha un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>valore della proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> di iniziale</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This value overrides the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: Questo valore sostituisce il valore specificato nella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo, ma può essere sottoposto a override da altre proprietà di stile di cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [stili della cella nel controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer> and cell styles specified through properties such as DefaultCellStyle have no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando sono abilitati, i pulsanti in una colonna vengono disegnati utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>e stili della cella specificati tramite la proprietà, ad esempio DefaultCellStyle non hanno alcun effetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> da applicare come stile predefinito.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat-style appearance of the button cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'aspetto bidimensionale delle celle pulsante nella colonna.

trans-unit.source: The FlatStyle property specifies the appearance of the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà FlatStyle specifica l'aspetto delle celle nella colonna.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>enumerazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottenere o impostare questa proprietà ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Imposta questa proprietà anche il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>visualizzare la colonna di proprietà di ogni cella nella colonna e l'aggiornamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Per ignorare il valore specificato per le singole celle, impostare i valori delle celle dopo aver impostato il valore della colonna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the appearance of the buttons in the column.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> valore che indica l'aspetto dei pulsanti nella colonna.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default text displayed on the button cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il testo predefinito visualizzato sul pulsante.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> contained in the column that has as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property value of `true` displays the Text property value on the cell's button.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>contenuti nella colonna che ha un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>valore della proprietà `true` consente di visualizzare il valore della proprietà Text sul pulsante della cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: If there is an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, changing this property refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Se è presente un oggetto associato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo, la modifica di questa proprietà consente di aggiornare la visualizzazione delle colonne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the text.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che contiene il testo.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta questa proprietà, il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa che descrive la colonna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che descrive la colonna.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*> property value is displayed as the button text for cells in this column.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*>valore della proprietà viene visualizzato come testo del pulsante per le celle della colonna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of a button cell is displayed as the text on the button.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>di un pulsante della cella viene visualizzata come testo nel pulsante.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The UseColumnTextForButtonValue property allows you to either set the button text for each cell, or to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> property value for all of the button cells.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà UseColumnTextForButtonValue consente di impostare il testo del pulsante per ogni cella o di utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>valore della proprietà per tutte le celle a pulsante.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottenere o impostare questa proprietà ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Imposta questa proprietà anche il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>visualizzare la colonna di proprietà di ogni cella nella colonna e l'aggiornamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Per ignorare il valore specificato per le singole celle, impostare i valori delle celle dopo aver impostato il valore della colonna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*> property value is displayed on buttons in the column; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue*> property value of each cell is displayed on its button.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <> </> *> valore della proprietà verrà visualizzato i pulsanti nella colonna. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se il <> </> *> valore della proprietà di ogni cella viene visualizzata nel pulsante.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>
